data.title: Russian Royalty
data.text:
NOTE: We have ancestors in what is now Russia even before those shown, pre-1168. They will be added as they are researched. This page will be under construction until all facts and pictures are published. All portraits are found on WikiPedia, http://en.wikipedia.org.

Grand Princes of Vladimir-Suzdal (1168 -1389)

St. Andrei I Bogolyubsky

1st Grand Prince of Vladimir

(3rd Cousin, 24x removed) (1111 - 1174)

Ruled 1168 - 1174

Son of Yuri I Dolgoruki 'Long Arms' Vladimirovich Grand Duke of Kiev

Mikhail

Grand Prince of Kiev

and Vladimir

(3rd Cousin, 24x removed) ( - )

Ruled 1174 - 1176

Son of Yuri I Dolgoruki 'Long Arms' Vladimirovich Grand Duke of Kiev

Vsevolod

'The Big Nest'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(3rd Cousin, 24x removed) (1154 - 1212)

Ruled 1176 - 1212

Son of Yuri I Dolgoruki 'Long Arms' Vladimirovich Grand Duke of Kiev

Yuri II

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(4th Cousin, 23x removed) (1189 - 1238)

Ruled 1218 - 1238 Restored

Son of Vsevolod 'The Big Nest', Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Constantine I of Rostov

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(4th Cousin, 23x removed) (1185 - 1218)

Ruled 1216 - 1218

Son of Vsevolod 'The Big Nest', Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Yuri II

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(4th Cousin, 23x removed) (1189 - 1238)

Ruled 1218 - 1238 Restored

Son of Vsevolod 'The Big Nest', Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Yaroslav II

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(3rd Cousin, 24x removed) (1191 - 1246)

Ruled 1238 - 1246

Son of Vsevolod 'The Big Nest', Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Sviatoslav III

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(4th Cousin, 23x removed) (1196 - 1252)

Ruled 1246 - 1248

Son of Vsevolod 'The Big Nest', Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Mikhail Khorobrit

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(5th Cousin, 22x removed) ( - 1248)

Ruled 1248

Son of Yaroslav II, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Andrew OR Andrei II

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(5th Cousin, 22x removed) (1222 - 1264)

Ruled 1248 - 1252

Son of Yaroslav II, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

St. Aleksander I Nevsky

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(5th Cousin, 22x removed) (c1220 - 1263)

Ruled 1252 - 1263

Son of Yaroslav II, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Yaroslav III

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(5th Cousin, 22x removed) (1232 - 1271)

Ruled 1264 - 1271

Son of Yaroslav II, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Vasily of Kostroma

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(5th Cousin, 22x removed) (1241 - 1276)

Ruled 1272 - 1277

Son of Yaroslav II, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Dmitri of Pereslavl

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1250 - 1293)

Ruled 1277 - 1294

Son of St. Aleksander I Nevsky, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Andrey III of Gorodets

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1255 - 1304)

Ruled 1294 - 1304

Son of St. Aleksander I Nevsky, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

St. Michael of Tver

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1271 - 1319)

Ruled 1304 - 1318

Son of Yaroslav III, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Yuri of Moscow

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1281 - 1325)

Ruled 1318 - 1322

Son of Daniel, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Dmitry I (II?) of Tver

'The Terrible Eyes'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(7th Cousin, 20x removed) (1299 - c1326)

Ruled 1322 - 1326

Son of St. Michael of Tver, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Alexander II of Tver

'The Liberator'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(7th Cousin, 20x removed) (1301 - 1340)

Ruled 1326 - 1327

Son of St. Michael of Tver, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Ivan I

'The Moneybag'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1288 - 1340)

Ruled 1328 - 1340

Son of Daniel Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Simeon

'The Proud'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(7th Cousin, 20x removed) (1316 - 1353)

Ruled 1341 - 1353

Son of Ivan I, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Ivan II

'The Fair'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(7th Cousin, 20x removed) (1326 - 1359)

Ruled 1353 - 1359

Son of Ivan I Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Dmitri of Suzdal

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1324 - 1383)

Ruled 1359 -1362

Son of Andrei II, Grand Prince of Vladimir

Dmitri I Donskoi

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(8th Cousin, 19x removed) (1350 - 1389)

Ruled 1359 -1389

Son of Ivan II 'The Fair' Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Rurik Dynasty (1283 - 1547) Grand Prince of Moscow

Daniel

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(5th Cousin, 22x removed) (1261 - 1303)

Ruled 1283 - 1303

Son of St. Aleksander I Nevsky Grand Prince of Vladimir

Yuri

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1281 - 1325)

Ruled 1303 - 1325

Son of Daniel, Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Ivan I

'The Moneybag'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(6th Cousin, 21x removed) (1288 - 1340)

Ruled 1325 - 1340

Son of Daniel Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Ivan II

'The Fair'

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(7th Cousin, 20x removed) (1326 - 1359)

Ruled 1353 - 1359

Son of Ivan I Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Dmitri I Donskoi

Grand Prince of Moscow

and Vladimir

(8th Cousin, 19x removed) (1350 - 1389)

Ruled 1359 -1389

Son of Ivan II 'The Fair' Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Vasili I

Grand Prince of Moscow

(9th Cousin, 18x removed) (1371 - 1425)

Ruled 1389 - 1425

Son of Dmitri I Donskoi Grand Prince of Moscow and Vladimir

Vasili II

'The Dark' OR 'The Blind'

Grand Prince of Moscow

(10th Cousin, 17x removed) (1415 - 1462)

Ruled 1425 - 1462

Son of Vasili I Grand Prince of Moscow

Ivan III Vasilievich

'The Great'

Grand Prince of Moscow

(11th Cousin, 16x removed) (1440 - 1505)

Ruled 1462 - 1505

Son of Vasili II 'The Dark' OR 'The Blind' Grand Prince of Moscow

Vasily III Ivanovich

Grand Prince of Moscow

(12th Cousin, 15x removed) (1479 - 1533)

Ruled 1505 - 1533

Son of Ivan III Vasilievich 'The Great' Grand Prince of Moscow

Ivan IV Vasilievich

'The Terrible'

Tsar of Russia

(13th Cousin, 14x removed) (1530 - 1584)

Ruled 1547 - 1584

Son of Vasili III Ivanovich Grand Prince of Moscow

Rurik Dynasty (1547 - 1721) Tsars of Russia

Ivan IV Vasilievich

'The Terrible'

Tsar of Russia

(13th Cousin, 14x removed) (1530 - 1584)

Ruled 1547 - 1584

Son of Vasili III Ivanovich Grand Prince of Moscow

Feodor I Ivanovich

'The Angelic'

Tsar of Russia

(14th Cousin, 13x removed) (1557 - 1598)

Ruled 1584 - 1598

Son of Ivan IV Tsar of Russia and Yelena OR Elena Glinskaya

Time of Troubles (1598 - 1613)

Boris Godunov

(c1550 - 1605)

Ruled 1598 - 1605

Son of Boris Ivanovich Gudunov

Feodor II

(1589 - 1605)

Ruled April - June 1605

Son of Boris Godunov, Tsar of Russia and Stepanida Ivanovna

Romanov Dynasty

Mikhail

(12 July 1596 - 14 July 1645)

Ruled 1613 - 1645

Son of Feodor Nikitich Romanov and Kseniya Ioannovna Shesotva

Married Maria Vladimirovna Dolgorukova, one stillborn child

Married Eudoxia Lukyanovna Streshneva,

10 children

Alexei

(9 May 1629 -

29 January 1676)

Ruled 1645 - 1676

Son of Tsar Mikhail and Eudoxia Lukyanova Streshneva

Married Maria Llyinichna Miloslavskaya, 13 children

Married Natalia Kirillovna Naryshkina, 3 children

Feodor III

(9 June 1661 -

7 May 1682)

Ruled 1676 - 1682

Son of Tsar Alexei and Maria Ilyinichna Miloslavskaya

Married Agaphia Simeonovna Grushevskaya, one son

Married Marfa Matveievna Apraksina, no children

Peter I

'The Great'

(9 June 1672 -

8 February 1725)

Ruled 1682 - 1725,

Jointly with Ivan V until 1696

Son of Tsar Alexei and Natalia Kirillovna Naryshkina

Married Eudoxia Feodorovna Lopukhina, three children

Married Marta Helena Skowronska, 9 children

Ivan V

(6 September 1666 --

8 Februqary 1696)

Ruled 1682 - 1696,

Jointly with Peter

Son of Tsar Alexei and Maria Ilyinichina Miloslavskaya

Married Praskovia Feodorovna Saltykova, five daughters

Romanov Dynasty (Emperors of Russia)

Peter I

'The Great'

(9 June 1672 -

8 February 1725)

Ruled 1682 - 1725

Son of Tsar Alexei and Natalia Kirillovna Naryshkina

Married Eudoxia Feodorovna Lopukhina, three children

Married Marta Helena Skowronska, 9 children

Catherine I

(15 April 1684)

Ruled 1725 - 1727

Daughter of Samuel Skowronski and Elisabeth Moritz

Married Peter I of Russia, 9 children

Peter III

(21 February 1728 -

17 July 1762)

Ruled 1762

Son of Charles Frederick, Duke of Hostein-Gottorp and Grand Duchess Anna Petrovna

Married Princess Sophie Friederike Auguste of Anhalt-Zerbst, one son

Murdered

Catherine II

'The Great'

(2 May 1729 -

6 November 1796)

Ruled 1762 - 1796

Daughter of August Prince of Anhalt-Zerbst and Princess Johanna Elisabeth of Hostein-Gottorp

Married Peter III, one son

Paul I

(1 October 1754 -

23 March 1801)

Ruled 1796 - 1801

Son of Emperor Peter III and Empress Catherine II

Married Princess Wilhelmina Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, stillborn daughter

Married Princess Sophie Dorothea of Wurttemberg, 10 children

Assassinated

Alexander I

'The Blessed'

(23 December 1777 -

1 December 1825)

Ruled 1801 - 1825

Son of Emperor Paul I and Maria Feodorovna (Sophie Dorothea of Wurttemberg)

Married Princess Louise of Baden, 2 daughters

Constantine I

(27 April 1779 - 27 June 1831)

Ruled 1825 (Disputed)

Son of Emperor Paul I and Maria Feodorovna (Sophie Dorothea of Wurttemberg

Married Prince Juliane of Saxe-Coburg-Saalfeld, no children

Alexander III

'The Peacemaker'

(10 March 1845 -

1 November 1894)

Rule 1881 - 1894

Son of Emperor Alexander II and Maria Alexandrovna (Marie of Hesse)

Married Princess Dagmar of Denmark, 6 children

Nicholas II

(6 May 1868 - 17 July 1918)

Ruled 1894-1917

Son of Emperor Alexander III and Maria Feodorvna (Dagmar of Denmark)

Married Princess Alix of Hesse and by Rhine, 5children (all assassinated)

Murdered by Bolsheviks
